about.title: About Me
about.introduction: I am a data scientist specializing in building end-to-end systems that derive actionable intelligence from real-world sensor data. The projects below demonstrate my capability in integrating custom hardware, robust software, and advanced perception models to solve complex operational challenges.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.outroMessage: I'm always excited to discuss new projects, collaborations, or opportunities. Feel free to reach out!

hero.name: Your Name
hero.introduction: A data scientist passionate about insights and intelligent solutions.
